name: Tomochesti
description:
Grow your chest to get cool rewards!

All graphics made with paint for Paint Jam!

Please note: the downloadable version is strongly recommended due to latency issues.

How to play:

  • Punch some coins out of your chest in Training mode.
  • Spend your coin in the shop to increase your chest level.
  • Open your chest to get your reward, the higher the level, the better the reward!

Did you know?

  • You can change the name of your chest!
  • There is a super special reward if you get to lvl 100+!

Have fun :)

post-jam update (3/20/2017): Added in-browser version. Fixed fullscreen scaling. Press alt-tab to enter fullscreen mode in downloadable file :)
